MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH42 postcode area of Dunbar, affecting properties in Easter Broomhouse and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.20am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigation work to locate the fault then make a repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.13pm on the 19th of April 2021.
